name: "A Date Game"
description:
"A Date Game" is a game about you and your date getting to know each other better while also having fun.

How "A Date Game" works:
You put the phone in the middle of the table while you and your date sit on opposite sides. With each tap a new question appears. Both of you may answer it or you can skip it.

"A Date Game" features:
60+ questions
No ads

Note that the game is only supposed to give you interesting conversation starters. By no means are you obligated to stick to the game's content. Feel free to explore each other's answers and have a conversation without further worries. You are playing together and not against each other after all.

You can get the game from the play store link or download the apk from the link below.

You can not redistribute this game.
